description: Try our easy to follow Thai Chicken Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Lebanese cucumbers, halved lengthways, thinly sliced
4 green shallots, ends trimmed, thinly sliced
4 chicken breast fillets, excess fat trimmed
1 tbs palm sugar, grated (or brown sugar)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large non-stick frying pan on medium heat. Add the chicken and cook for 4-5 minutes. Turn and cook for a further 3-4 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate and set aside to cool.
Thinly slice chicken diagonally and place in a large serving bowl.
Add the cucumber, tomato, shallots, bean sprouts, mint and coriander. Toss until well combined.
To make the dressing, combine the sweet chilli sauce, lemon juice, fish sauce and sugar in a jug.
Drizzle the dressing over the chicken salad and serve immediately.
